name: Bulos VR
description: This is a color matching game for HTC Vive, The objects come in a line and when you match 3 or more colors, they will explode and spawn a bonus, if you shoot down the bonus you have a faster projectile, once you finish one round, another will start ( max 4 rounds ). you can see the gameplay here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=218DFUEua3Y
